section.title: Create a new pattern to group projects.
section.para: To create a new grouping pattern you neen to open Windows->Preferences->Automatics WorkingSets page.
Then you should click New button. You will get a Add new pattern dialog.
As you see it's dialog contains a Pattern field. Here you can insert your pattern. We leave a default value. After entering pattern click OK. The pattern will be add to the Grouping patterns list.
Finally you need to select Automatic grouping of projects checkbox to start project proccesing.
